publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5789 Mr Jack McConnell: Motion of Thanks to the Presiding Officerâ€”That the Parliament expresses its thanks and gratitude to George Reid for his service to the Parliament and recognises the important role he has carried out as its second Presiding Officer. Supported by: Nicola Sturgeon*, Miss Annabel Goldie*, Nicol Stephen*, Robin Harper*, Colin Fox*, Margo MacDonald*, Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-5789 Motion of Thanks to the Presiding Officer (lodged on 26 March 2007) Linda Fabiani*
